description: Fast and efficient text-to-video generation with Google's Veo 3 model

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A cinematic shot of a bustling city street at golden hour...

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video

prompt_details.style_guide: Create cinematic, realistic scenes with detailed descriptions and natural movements
best_practices: Use cinematic language and camera terminology
Describe realistic lighting and atmospheric conditions
Include natural human movements and expressions
Focus on photorealistic details and textures
Mention specific camera angles and movements

example_prompts.title: Urban Cinematic
example_prompts.prompt: A cinematic shot of a bustling city street at golden hour, camera slowly tracking a woman in a red coat as she walks through the crowd, warm sunlight creating dramatic shadows between tall buildings

example_prompts.title: Nature Documentary
example_prompts.prompt: Close-up of a hummingbird hovering near a vibrant flower, wings beating rapidly, morning dew visible on petals, soft natural lighting, camera following the bird's graceful movements

request.prompt: A peaceful lake at sunrise with mist rising from the water
A chef expertly chopping vegetables in a modern kitchen, knife moving rhythmically, steam rising from a nearby pan

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use realistic, cinematic descriptions for best results
Veo 3 excels at natural human movements and expressions
Include specific lighting conditions for better atmosphere
Longer durations allow for more complex scene development
Fast variant optimized for quick generation times
limitations: Optimized for speed over maximum quality
Best suited for realistic rather than stylized content
Complex fantasy scenes may be less accurate
Processing time varies with scene complexity
